content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}]

thought: I need to craft 2 warped trapdoors. This requires 3 rows of 3 warped planks each. The first row will be placed in slots 1, 2, 3. Therefore I will start by moving 1 warped plank from slot 26 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "warped_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}]
thought: Next I need to place another warped plank to the right of the previous one, which is slot 2. Therefore I will move 1 warped plank from slot 26 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}]
thought: Next I need to place another warped plank to the right of the previous one, which is slot 3. Therefore I will move 1 warped plank from slot 26 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}]
thought: Now that the first row is complete, I will start on the second row. This starts in slot 4, so I will move 1 warped plank from slot 26 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
